726432f-a.text:
Crescent Street, south from 21st Avenue. On the left is the Seacrest Sanitarium and in the background is the Hellgate
Bridge.
P. L. Sperr  March 23, 1932

726431f-a.text:
Crescent Street, east side, between 21st Ave. (left) and Ditmars Boulevard, showing the William H. Wolcott house in 1873. F.H. Wolcott removed in 1849 from Flushing to this house. In 1934, it was the
Seacrest Sanitarium, and Dr. Kendrick was the owner.
April 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
